hotels.title: World-Renowned Relais & Châteaux Luxury in the Heart of Burgundy
hotels.description: Explore the French region of Burgundy, famed the world over for its wines, at Domaine de Rymska - Relais & Châteaux, a beautifully refurbished and intimate residence set amid lush green hills in manicured surrounds. Leave the hustle and bustle behind and soak up the serenity of this picturesque part of the world with a stay at this five-star paradise of 10 rooms and suites. Days are spent exploring the sprawling 80 hectares of ground and nearby vineyards, sampling gourmet local produce, or taking in the historic landscapes. Onsite you'll find a heated swimming pool, wine cellar, Porsche and electric bike rental (surcharges apply), majestic thoroughbred horses at the property’s stud farm, and the sophisticated La Table de Rymska - offering traditional cuisine created from the estate’s own livestock farm, vegetable garden and orchard.
